long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon scouting made simple. Save time by adding catalogs from competitive storefronts to your Synfny account without leaving the Amazon page. Synfny's Chrome Extension makes your sourcing workflow even faster!

Synfny is a cutting edge Amazon selling tool that combines product research, CRM, and mass emailing to connect you with brands instantly.

Discovering and reaching out to great brands is quick and easy with the Synfny Chrome extension. We are dedicated to helping Amazon sellers, whether they are just starting out or have been selling for a while. Your brand research is and communication is made easy, all while browsing Amazon.

We currently support Amazon marketplaces in the United States and working to add even more soon!
